item.title: New blog subscription feed address
item.description: This feed is a year and a half out of date, please use our new one at http://groups.google.com/group/metalink-announce/feed/atom_v1_0_msgs.xml

item.title: Orbit Downloader 1.3.1 (Windows) supports Metalink!
item.description: Orbit Downloader 1.3.1 (Windows) supports Metalink! It also has cool features like grabbing Youtube video and other streaming protocols.

item.title: wxDownload Fast 0.5.4 is out!
item.description: wxDownload Fast 0.5.4 is out with fixes and a new theme!

item.title: Metalink and Podcasts
item.description: G3Signal has their podcasts available with Metalink.

item.title: Orbit Downloader (BETA) supports Metalink
item.description: Orbit Downloader (Windows) is adding Metalink support! It also has cool features like grabbing Youtube video and other streaming protocols.

item.title: Website is back up...
item.description: After a week, the site is back up. If you like having sites down for a week, I recommend RegisterFly.

item.title: Free Download Manager (BETA) supports Metalink
item.description: Free Download Manager (Windows) has added Metalink support to a pre-release beta version which we're very excited about seeing finalized and released!

item.title: Want to get involved with Metalink?
item.description: We need developers! If you're interested in Metalink, get involved! A libcurl or wget interface would be helpful. Also, here's some quick Metalink info in Spanish.

item.title: Get openSUSE 10.2!
item.description: openSUSE 10.2 is out! If you have trouble downloading the ISOs, try using aria2 (SUSE RPMs) with the Metalinks.

item.title: Metalink tools 0.3.2 have been released!
item.description: Metalink tools 0.3.2 (Unix/Windows) have been released! There are a bunch of fixes and new features. The most important feature is the generation of chunk checksums. These command line tools allow you to generate metalinks with mirrors and nearly every checksum imaginable. Comments and suggestions are welcome.

item.title: "Making Metalinks"
item.description: "Making Metalinks" by Darius Liktorius, Bram Neijt, and Manuel Subredu is a walk through the process of creating Metalinks with the various programs available. If you're thinking about offering Metalinks for your project, you'll want to read this.

item.title: Downloading with Metalink...
item.description: An article on WEB-DOT-DEV talks about the Free Software alternatives for downloading with Metalink.

item.title: Metalink tools 0.3.1 have been released!
item.description: Bram Neijt's Metalink tools 0.3.1 (Unix/Windows) have been released! There are a bunch of fixes and new features. These command line tools allow you to generate metalinks with mirrors and nearly every checksum imaginable. Comments and suggestions are welcome.

item.title: aria2 0.9.0 (Unix), the high speed download utility with Metalink support, is out with new features!
item.description:
aria2 0.9.0 (Unix), the high speed download utility with Metalink support, is out! New Metalink features include downloading multiple files (download queue) and downloading by location. Thanks, Tatsuhiro! aria2 development never stands still.

There's also a blurb on thinknext.net (Chinese) by Xiaohu Zhou.

item.title: "Downloading bliss with Metalink" by Mayank Sharma on linux.com.
item.description:
"Downloading bliss with Metalink" by Mayank Sharma on linux.com. Great article, thanks Mayank! Digg it!

The article is also available in Japanese.

item.title: TrueBSD adds Metalinks for their distribution.
item.description: TrueBSD, a LiveCD operating system based on FreeBSD with many useful applications, uses Metalinks for their distribution.

item.title: GoboLinux adds Metalinks for their distribution.
item.description: GoboLinux, an alternative Linux distribution which redefines the entire filesystem hierarchy, uses Metalinks for their distribution.

item.title: Metalink tools 0.3.0 have been released!
item.description: Bram Neijt's Metalink tools 0.3.0 (Unix/Windows) have been released! These command line tools allow you to generate metalinks with mirrors and nearly every checksum imaginable. Comments and suggestions are welcome.

item.title: wxDownload Fast 0.5.3 is out!
item.description: wxDownload Fast 0.5.3 is out and looks mighty fine

item.title: wxDownload Fast 0.5.2 and FlashGot 0.5.97 are out!
item.description:
FlashGot 0.5.97 is out! Grab it for increased Metalink compatibility and Firefox integration with

wxDownload Fast 0.5.2, which is also out with improved graphics.

item.title: Eiffel Software uses Metalink for their downloads.
item.description: Eiffel Software uses Metalink for their downloads. They offer a compiler/development IDE for the Eiffel programming language, among other things.

item.title: Metalinks for Fedora Core 6, Ubuntu 6.10, openSUSE 10.2 Beta1.
item.description: Metalink @ Packages Resources, as always, provides metalinks for new releases as soon as they hit the mirrors: Fedora Core 6, Ubuntu 6.10, openSUSE 10.2 Beta1.

item.title: Bram Neijt's Metalink tools 0.2.1 have been released!
item.description: Bram Neijt's Metalink tools 0.2.1 (Unix/Windows) have been released! These command line tools allow you to generate metalinks with mirrors and nearly every checksum imaginable. Comments and suggestions are welcome.

item.title: RoPkg::Metalink 0.2.5 is out!
item.description: RoPkg::Metalink 0.2.5 (Unix), used at Metalink @ Packages Resources, is out! Thanks to Manuel for all his hard work.

item.title: Bram Neijt's Metalink tools 0.2.0 have been released!
item.description: Bram Neijt's Metalink tools 0.2.0 (Unix/Windows) have been released! These command line tools allow you to generate metalinks with mirrors and nearly every checksum imaginable. Comments and suggestions are welcome. Download em with metalink.

item.title: RoPkg::Metalink has been updated.
item.description: RoPkg::Metalink, used at Metalink @ Packages Resources, has been updated.

item.title: Metalink mailing lists!
item.description: Metalink mailing lists! Announcements for occasional news and Discussion for general talk about Metalink.

item.title: PC-BSD adds Metalinks for their ISO downloads.
item.description: PC-BSD, based on BSD and designed with the "casual" computer user in mind, uses Metalink for their ISO downloads. If you're not ready to replace Windows, test out the PC-BSD VMWare image. You might get hooked! It also has other neat things like PBI for package installation (there is a PBI for aria2) and the people are very helpful and friendly. Thanks, Charles!

item.title: aria2 0.8.1 (Unix), the high speed download utility with Metalink support, has been released.
item.description: aria2 0.8.1 (Unix), the high speed download utility with Metalink support, is out!

item.title: redWall Firewall adds Metalinks for their ISO downloads.
item.description: redWall Firewall uses Metalink for their ISO downloads. redWall Firewall is a bootable CD-ROM firewall based on Gentoo Linux.

item.title: Simba 0.8.4 is out!
item.description: Simba the mirroring tool, 0.8.4 has been released with integrated Metalink support.

item.title: aria2 0.8.0 (Unix), the high speed download utility with Metalink support, is out!
item.description:
aria2 0.8.0 (Unix), the high speed download utility with Metalink support, is out! Binaries are available for many distributions, but a few are missing. Who wants to package it up for Ubuntu and SUSE? It would be nice to see packages for

Simba too.

Berry Linux could use a few more mirrors.

item.title: Arch Linux adds Metalinks for their ISO downloads.
item.description: Arch Linux uses Metalink for their ISO downloads. Arch Linux is a lightweight and flexible linux distribution for i686 and x86-64 architectures that tries to Keep It Simple.

item.title: Simba 0.8.3 is out; GetRight 6.0c released with improved Metalink support.
item.description:
Simba the mirroring tool, 0.8.3 has been released. Version 0.9 plans to integrate Simba with Metalink.

GetRight 6.0c released with improved Metalink support.

item.title: PuppyLinux uses Metalink for their ISO download.
item.description: PuppyLinux uses Metalink for their ISO download. "Puppy Linux is a small, fully featured Linux distribution. Puppy works swiftly on older systems and on modern computers including ThinPCs."

item.title: "Metalink: A Better Way to Download" on P2P File Sharing.
item.description: Metalink: A Better Way to Download" on P2P File Sharing.
